name: Drive (boxman42)
description:
This game was made for a term project. 

Drive down the highway listening to your favorite tunes.  This is a short game where you can fly down the road listening to your favorite music or sit down and listen to the ocean and spring peepers. 

To play game: download drive game.zip -> extracnt to preferred destination -> run drive.exe

To add your own music:  open folder drive game -> drive_Data -> StreamingAssets -> music

Add any music or sound files to this path and it will be played in the game (only supports .wav audio files).
